summary: Guys i am sure you will like ,,Distance terrain with More detail and with Hd resolution ...
descriptionHtml:
[color=#bf9000][size=6]HD Enhanced Terrain[/size][/color]
*************************************************************************************************************************

*************************************************************************************************************************

[size=4] --THE NEW VERSION "PRO" IS MADE TO PROVIDE THE BEST QUALITY AND MORE DETAIL .[/size]

[size=4] --THE TEXTURES ARE 2K , AND I WILL ALSO RECOMMENDED THE 2K TEXTURES ONLY AS THEY WILL GIVE YOU        BEST QUALITY AND BETTER DETAIL .[/size]

[size=4] --I HAD PROVIDED ONLY 2K TEXTURES BECAUSE BOTH 1K AND 2K TEXTURES ARE GIVING NO PERFORMANCE          LOSS  BUT 1K TEXTURES WILL DEGRADE THE QUALITY.[/size]

[size=4] --I HOPE THE NEW VERSION WILL REPLACE THE PREVIOUS VERSION FROM YOUR NMM.[/size]

[size=4] --INSTALLATION IS SIMPLE AS PREVIOUS (USE NMM).[/size]

[size=4] --THEIR IS NO NEED OF ANY OTHER MOD.[/size]

[size=4] --AS I HAD SAID ABOVE THEIR IS NO PERFORMANCE LOSS (EVEN NOT ON GRAPHIC CARD LIKE 8400 GS).
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
[/size][center][size=4][size=5][color=#efefef]My latest Mod :[/color] [/size][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81647/?]NaturalRoads[/url][/size][/size]
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/center]
[color=#ff7700][size=5](ABOUT THE TWO VERSIONS)
[/size][/color]
[size=4]  -[/size][color=#bf9000][size=4]BLENDED VERSION[/size][/color][size=4]- THIS VERSION WILL GIVE YOU THE BEST QUALITY AND DETAIL AT MAXIMUM BLENDING[/size]
[size=4]  -[/size][color=#bf9000][size=4]LUSH VERSION[/size][/color][size=4]- THIS VERSION WILL GIVE YOU THE MAXIMUM EFFECT WITH A BIT LESS BLENDING (NOT EASILY NOTICEABLE) .

[/size]

[size=4][All the Below VIDEOS are Related to Previous Version][/size]

[color=green][size=5]Videos----
[/size]
[size=4] 1:By "Hodilton" on both youtube and nexus[/size]

[youtube]aav9FbPYKVY#![/youtube]
[size=4]***************************************************************************************************************[/size]
[size=4] 2:By "LiveStyleGaming" on youtube and "Preykousis" on Nexus[/size]

[youtube]KxDGo5rSrTo[/youtube]
[size=4]*******************************************************************************************************[/size]
[size=4] 3:By "BDMods" on both nexus and Youtube[/size]

[youtube]JT5hW0hwJHM[/youtube]
[size=4]*******************************************************************************************************************[/size][/color]
[size=3]
- This mod gives a more detailed "grass-like" effect to terrain at long-distance (hence the increased noise) and contains higher-resolution detail.
- Texture size is double that of OpticShooter's original terrain enhancement at 2048x2048 pixels.
- Adds a more rugged-look to Skyrim's vistas.
- No noticeable hit to performance or frame-rate drop.
- Simply install as you would any other texture replacement.
- Please upload images [for feedback] and comment with any problems or suggestions.[/size]


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3][color=red]
Credits--
Hodliton , Preykousis and BDMods for videos..
Skyrim makers
Nexus site for its wonderful place for moders[/color][/size]
author: Hritik Vaishnav -SkyrimENB
